notes:
Boss of Scrapper level Pit #5.
[[Grimgor Guteater|Next #6]].
name: Slim
behaviour: It looks exactly like and uses same array of attacks as a [[Bonebeast]].
strategy:
Druid or Sorcerer: Use [[Flame Strike]] and [[Exura]] running it around.
Knight: Just melee and use [[Exori]] if you need to kill it fast.
Paladin: Run in Circles and attack with [[Divine Missile]] if needed.
